entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:22 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:22 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening and before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 late in the evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:22 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
